items.sentence: I\'ll be waiting for you at the usual place.
I\'ll bring my sister when I come next time.
I\'ll call you if I require your assistance.
Tom assured me that this would never happen.
Tom ate the orange without peeling it first.
Tom awoke to find himself in a strange room.
Tom backed his car out of the parking space.
Tom beat Mary to within an inch of her life.
I don\'t want you to think about it anymore.
Don\'t eat green apples or you\'ll get sick.
Mary keeps her laptop with her at all times.
Tom\'s house shouldn\'t be too hard to find.
I don\'t think people use that word anymore.
I don\'t think that I want to go to college.
I don\'t think that Tom will ever come back.
Tom usually gets home at about six o\'clock.
Tom wanted to know why he couldn\'t go, too.
It seems like I\'m going to have a hard day.
It was fun going to Chuck\'s Diner with you.
It\'s almost seven. We have to go to school.
